scripts.build-data: (cd ../slavdict/; pipenv run bin/csl_dict_dumper.py; pipenv run bin/csl_refs_dumper.py)
scripts.production: rm -fr build .build; CSL_ENV=production gulp; yarn run sync-data; git --work-tree=../slavdict.github.io --git-dir=../slavdict.github.io/.git checkout master; rsync -av --checksum --delete --exclude CNAME --exclude .git --exclude .gitignore --exclude now.json --exclude *.pdf build/ ../slavdict.github.io/
scripts.sync-data: rm -fr build/a build/e build/xp build/xf build/xg build/xgr; cp -R .temp/slavdict_generated/entries build/e; cp -R .temp/slavdict_generated/partial_index build/xp; cp -R .temp/slavdict_generated/greek_index build/xg; cp -R .temp/slavdict_generated/greek_index_reverse build/xgr; cp -R .temp/refs/annotations build/a
